snippet: If Utah wins the Pac-12, it will come after going through the gauntlet of Stanford, Oregon State, Oregon and Arizona in the home finale.
abstract: College Basketball Roundup; Virginia defeats North Carolina State, 51-47, in men's action; other men's and women's scores noted.
lead_paragraph: If Utah wins the Pac-12, it will come after going through the gauntlet of Stanford, Oregon State, Oregon and Arizona in the home finale.

headline.print_headline: Virginia Holds Off a Pesky N.C. State
headline.main: Virginia Holds Off A Pesky N.C. State
